lead_paragraph: Juventus was stunned by Lech Poznan's stoppage-time equalizer, defending champion Atlético Madrid lost at Aris, and Liverpool comfortably beat Steaua Bucharest to open the Europa League.
snippet: Juventus was stunned by Lech Poznan's stoppage-time equalizer, defending champion Atlético Madrid lost at Aris, and Liverpool comfortably beat Steaua Bucharest to open the Europa League.
